GK19kalrs_pu:3: maṇiprakārāḥ sarasaṃ ca candanaṃ śucau priye yānti janasya sevyatām //
GK19kalrs_pu:5: sutantrigītaṃ madanasya dīpanaṃ śucau niśīthe 'nubhavanti kāminaḥ //
GK19kalrs_pu:7: śiroruhaiḥ snānakaṣāyavāsitaiḥ striyo nidāghaṃ śamayanti kāminām //
GK19kalrs_pu:9: pade pade haṃsarutānukāribhir janasya cittaṃ kriyate samanmatham //
GK19kalrs_pu:11: nitambadeśāśca sahemamekhalāḥ prakurvate kasya mano na sotsukam //
GK19kalrs_pu:16: siteṣu harmyeṣu niśāsu yoṣitāṃ sukhaprasuptāni mukhāni candramāḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:17: vilokya nūnaṃ bhṛśamutsukaściraṃ niśākṣaye yāti hriyeva pāṇḍutām //
GK19kalrs_pu:20: mṛgāḥ pracaṇḍātapatāpitā bhṛśaṃ tṛṣā mahatyā pariśuṣkatālavaḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:21: vanāntare toyamiti pradhāvitā nirīkṣya bhinnāñjanasaṃnibhaṃ nabhaḥ //
GK19kalrs_pu:23: anaṅgasaṃdīpanamāśu kurvate yathā pradoṣāḥ śaśicārubhūṣaṇāḥ // KalRs_1.12
GK19kalrs_pu:24: ravermayūkhair abhitāpito bhṛśaṃ vidahyamānaḥ pathi taptapāṃsubhiḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:25: avāṅmukho jihmagatiḥ śvasanmuhuḥ phaṇī mayūrasya tale niṣīdati //
GK19kalrs_pu:29: pravṛddhatṛṣṇopahatā jalārthino na dantinaḥ kesariṇo 'pi bibhyati //
GK19kalrs_pu:31: na bhoginaṃ ghnanti samīpavartinaṃ kalāpacakreṣu niveśitānanam //
GK19kalrs_pu:35: utplutya bhekastṛṣitasya bhoginaḥ phaṇātapatrasya tale niṣīdati //
GK19kalrs_pu:39: viṣāgnisūryātapatāpitaḥ phaṇī na hanti maṇḍūkakulaṃ tṛṣākulaḥ //
GK19kalrs_pu:41: tṛṣākulaṃ niḥsṛtamadrigahvarād avekṣamāṇaṃ mahiṣīkulaṃ jalam // KalRs_1.21
GK19kalrs_pu:43: dinakaraparitāpakṣīṇatoyāḥ samantād vidadhati bhayamuccair vīkṣyamāṇā vanāntāḥ // KalRs_1.22
GK19kalrs_pu:44: śvasiti vihagavargaḥ śīrṇaparṇadrumasthaḥ kapikulamupayāti klāntamadrer nikuñjam /
GK19kalrs_pu:45: bhramati gavayayūthaḥ sarvatastoyamicchañ śarabhakulamajihmaṃ proddharatyambu kūpāt // KalRs_1.23
GK19kalrs_pu:47: taṭaviṭapalatāgrāliṅganavyākulena diśi diśi paridagdhā bhūmayaḥ pāvakena
GK19kalrs_pu:48: jvalati pavanavṛddhaḥ parvatānāṃ darīṣu sphuṭati paṭuninādaiḥ śuṣkavaṃśasthalīṣu /
GK19kalrs_pu:49: prasarati tṛṇamadhye labdhavṛddhiḥ kṣaṇena glapayati mṛgavargaṃ prāntalagno davāgniḥ // KalRs_1.25
GK19kalrs_pu:50: bahutara iva jātaḥ śālmalīnāṃ vaneṣu sphurati kanakagauraḥ koṭareṣu drumāṇām /
GK19kalrs_pu:53: gajagavayamṛgendrā vahnisaṃtaptadehāḥ suhṛda iva sametā dvaṃdvabhāvaṃ vihāya /
GK19kalrs_pu:54: hutavahaparikhedād āśu nirgatya kakṣād vipulapulinadeśāṃ nimnagāṃ saṃviśanti // KalRs_1.27
GK19kalrs_pu:56: vrajatu tava nidāghaḥ kāminībhiḥ sameto niśi sulalitagīte harmyapṛṣṭhe sukhena // KalRs_1.28
GK19kalrs_pu:58: samāgato rājavad uddhatadyutir ghanāgamaḥ kāmijanapriyaḥ priye //
GK19kalrs_pu:70: striyaḥ suduṣṭā iva jātivibhramāḥ prayānti nadyastvaritaṃ payonidhim //
GK19kalrs_pu:72: vanāni vaindhyāni haranti mānasaṃ vibhūṣitānyudgatapallavair drumaiḥ //
GK19kalrs_pu:74: samācitā saikatinī vanasthalī samutsukatvaṃ prakaroti cetasaḥ // KalRs_2.9
GK19kalrs_pu:78: kṛtāparādhānapi yoṣitaḥ priyān pariṣvajante śayane nirantaram //
GK19kalrs_pu:83: vipattrapuṣpāṃ nalinīṃ samutsukā vihāya bhṛṅgāḥ śrutihārinisvanāḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:84: patanti mūḍhāḥ śikhināṃ pranṛtyatāṃ kalāpacakreṣu navotpalāśayā //
GK19kalrs_pu:88: pravṛttanṛtyaiḥ śikhibhiḥ samākulāḥ samutsukatvaṃ janayanti bhūdharāḥ //
GK19kalrs_pu:90: sasīkarāmbhodharasaṅgaśītalaḥ samīraṇaḥ kaṃ na karoti sotsukam //
GK19kalrs_pu:92: stanaiḥ sahārairvadanaiḥ sasīdhubhiḥ striyo ratiṃ saṃjanayanti kāminām //
GK19kalrs_pu:93: vahanti varṣanti nadanti bhānti vyāyanti nṛtyanti samāśrayanti /
GK19kalrs_pu:94: nadyo ghanā mattagajā vanāntāḥ priyāvihīnāḥ śikhinaḥ plavaṃgāḥ //
GK19kalrs_pu:97: mālāḥ kadambanavakesaraketakībhir āyojitāḥ śirasi bibhrati yoṣito 'dya /
GK19kalrs_pu:100: śrutvā dhvaniṃ jalamucāṃ tvaritaṃ pradoṣe śayyāgṛhaṃ gurugṛhātpraviśanti nāryaḥ // KalRs_2.22
GK19kalrs_pu:101: kuvalayadalanīlair unnatais toyanamrair mṛdupavanavidhūtair mandamandaṃ caladbhiḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:102: apahṛtamiva cetastoyadaiḥ sendracāpaiḥ pathikajanavadhūnāṃ tadviyogākulānām // KalRs_2.23
GK19kalrs_pu:103: mudita iva kadambairjātapuṣpaiḥ samantāt pavanacalitaśākhaiḥ śākhibhirnṛtyatīva /
GK19kalrs_pu:104: hasitamiva vidhatte sūcibhiḥ ketakīnāṃ navasalilaniṣekacchinnatāpo vanāntaḥ // KalRs_2.24
GK19kalrs_pu:106: vikacanavakadambaiḥ karṇapūraṃ vadhūnāṃ racayati jaladaughaḥ kāntavatkāla eṣaḥ // KalRs_2.25
GK19kalrs_pu:110: janitaruciragandhaḥ ketakīnāṃ rajobhiḥ pariharati nabhasvān proṣitānāṃ manāṃsi // KalRs_2.27
GK19kalrs_pu:112: atiśayaparuṣābhir grīṣmavahneḥ śikhābhiḥ samupajanitatāpaṃ hlādayantīva vindhyam // KalRs_2.28
GK19kalrs_pu:114: jaladasamaya eṣa prāṇināṃ prāṇabhūto diśatu tava hitāni prāyaśo vāñchitāni
GK19kalrs_pu:117: kāśair mahī śiśiradīdhitinā rajanyo haṃsairjalāni saritāṃ kumudaiḥ sarāṃsi /
GK19kalrs_pu:118: saptacchadaiḥ kusumabhāranatairvanāntāḥ śuklīkṛtānyupavanāni ca mālatībhiḥ // KalRs_3.2
GK19kalrs_pu:120: nadyo viśālapulināntanitambabimbā mandaṃ prayānti samadāḥ pramadā ivādya
GK19kalrs_pu:122: saṃlakṣyate pavanavegacalaiḥ payodai rājeva cāmaraśatair upavījyamānaḥ //
GK19kalrs_pu:123: bhinnāñjanapracayakānti nabho manojñaṃ bandhūkapuṣparajasāruṇitā ca bhūmiḥ
GK19kalrs_pu:124: vaprāśca pakvakalamāvṛtabhūmibhāgāḥ protkaṇṭhayanti na mano bhuvi kasya yūnaḥ // KalRs_3.5
GK19kalrs_pu:126: mattadvirephaparipītamadhuprasekaś cittaṃ vidārayati kasya na kovidāraḥ //
GK19kalrs_pu:128: jyotsnādukūlamamalaṃ rajanī dadhānā vṛddhiṃ prayātyanudinaṃ pramadeva bālā
GK19kalrs_pu:130: kurvanti haṃsavirutaiḥ parito janasya prītiṃ saroruharajo 'ruṇitās
GK19kalrs_pu:135: utphullapaṅkajavanāṃ nalinīṃ vidhunvan nyūnāṃ manaścalayati prasabhaṃ nabhasvān // KalRs_3.10
GK19kalrs_pu:138: naṣṭaṃ dhanurbalabhido jaladodareṣu saudāminī sphurati nādya viyatpatākā /
GK19kalrs_pu:139: dhunvanti pakṣapavanairna nabho balākāḥ paśyanti nonnatamukhā gaganaṃ mayūrāḥ // KalRs_3.12
GK19kalrs_pu:147: haṃsaiḥ sasārasakulaiḥ pratināditāni sīmāntarāṇi janayanti nṛṇāṃ pramodam
GK19kalrs_pu:149: nīlotpalairmadakalāni vilocanāni bhrūvibhramāśca rucirās tanubhis taraṃgaiḥ // KalRs_3.17
GK19kalrs_pu:150: śyāmā latāḥ kusumabhāranatapravālāḥ strīṇāṃ haranti dhṛtabhūṣaṇabāhukāntim
GK19kalrs_pu:153: karṇeṣu ca pravarakāñcanakuṇḍaleṣu nīlotpalāni vividhāni niveśayanti //
GK19kalrs_pu:154: hāraiḥ sacandanarasaiḥ stanamaṇḍalāni śroṇītaṭaṃ suvipulaṃ rasanākalāpaiḥ
GK19kalrs_pu:157: śriyamatiśayarūpāṃ vyoma toyāśayānāṃ vahati vigatameghaṃ candratārāvakīrṇam // KalRs_3.21
GK19kalrs_pu:158: śaradi kumudasaṅgādvāyavo vānti śītā vigatajaladavṛndā digvibhāgā manojñāḥ
GK19kalrs_pu:159: vigatakaluṣamambhaḥ śyānapaṅkā dharitrī vimalakiraṇacandraṃ vyoma tārāvicitram // KalRs_3.22
GK19kalrs_pu:161: racitakusumagandhi prāyaśo yānti veśma prabalamadanahetostyaktasaṃgītarāgāḥ // KalRs_3.23
GK19kalrs_pu:162: suratarasavilāsāḥ satsakhībhiḥ sametā asamaśaravinodaṃ sūcayanti prakāmam
GK19kalrs_pu:163: anupamamukharāgā rātrimadhye vinodaṃ śaradi taruṇakāntāḥ sūcayanti pramodān // KalRs_3.24
GK19kalrs_pu:164: divasakaramayūkhair bādhyamānaṃ prabhāte varayuvatimukhābhaṃ paṅkajaṃ jṛmbhate 'dya /
GK19kalrs_pu:165: kumudamapi gate 'staṃ līyate candrabimbe hasitamiva vadhūnāṃ proṣiteṣu priyeṣu // KalRs_3.25
GK19kalrs_pu:167: adhararuciraśobhāṃ bandhujīve priyāṇāṃ pathikajana idānīṃ roditi bhrāntacittaḥ // KalRs_3.26
GK19kalrs_pu:168: strīṇāṃ vihāya vadaneṣu śaśāṅkalakṣmīṃ kāmyaṃ ca haṃsavacanaṃ maṇinūpureṣu /
GK19kalrs_pu:169: bandhūkakāntimadhareṣu manohareṣu kvāpi prayāti subhagā śaradāgamaśrīḥ //
GK19kalrs_pu:171: kumudarucirakāntiḥ kāminīvonmadeyaṃ pratidiśatu śaradvaścetasaḥ prītimagryām // KalRs_3.28
GK19kalrs_pu:176: na bāhuyugmeṣu vilāsinīnāṃ prayānti saṅgaṃ valayāṅgadāni /
GK19kalrs_pu:177: nitambabimbeṣu navaṃ dukūlaṃ tanvaṃśukaṃ pīnapayodhareṣu // KalRs_4.3 //
GK19kalrs_pu:178: kāñcīguṇaiḥ kāñcanaratnacitrair no bhūṣayanti pramadā nitambān /
GK19kalrs_pu:181: śirāṃsi kālāgurudhūpitāni kurvanti nāryaḥ suratotsavāya // KalRs_4.5 //
GK19kalrs_pu:183: hasanti noccair daśanāgrabhinnān prapīḍyamānān adharān avekṣya //
GK19kalrs_pu:189: prasannatoyāni suśītalāni sarāṃsi cetāṃsi haranti puṃsām // KalRs_4.9 //
GK19kalrs_pu:192: pākaṃ vrajantī himajātaśītair ādhūyamānā satataṃ marudbhiḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:193: priye priyaṅguḥ priyaviprayuktā vipāṇḍutāṃ yāti vilāsinīva // KalRs_4.11
GK19kalrs_pu:199: dantacchadaṃ priyatamena nipītasāraṃ dantāgrabhinnam avakṛṣya nirīkṣate ca
GK19kalrs_pu:205: anyā priyeṇa paribhuktamavekṣya gātraṃ harṣānvitā viracitādharacāruśobhā /
GK19kalrs_pu:208: saṃhṛṣyamāṇapulakorupayodharāntā abhyañjanaṃ vidadhati pramadāḥ suśobhāḥ // KalRs_4.18
GK19kalrs_pu:210: vinipatitatuṣāraḥ krauñcanādopagītaḥ pradiśatu himayuktaḥ kāla eṣaḥ sukhaṃ vaḥ // KalRs_4.19
GK19kalrs_pu:212: prakāmakāmaṃ pramadājanapriyaṃ varoru kālaṃ śiśirāhvayaṃ śṛṇu // KalRs_5.1
GK19kalrs_pu:214: gurūṇi vāsāṃsyabalāḥ sayauvanāḥ prayānti kāle 'tra janasya sevyatām //
GK19kalrs_pu:215: na candanaṃ candramarīciśītalaṃ na harmyapṛṣṭhaṃ śaradindunirmalam /
GK19kalrs_pu:216: na vāyavaḥ sāndratuṣāraśītalā janasya cittaṃ ramayanti sāmpratam //
GK19kalrs_pu:218: vipāṇḍutārāgaṇacārubhūṣaṇā janasya sevyā na bhavanti rātrayaḥ // KalRs_5.4
GK19kalrs_pu:224: bhramanti mandaṃ śramakheditoravaḥ kṣapāvasāne navayauvanāḥ striyaḥ //
GK19kalrs_pu:226: niveśitāntaḥ kusumaiḥ śiroruhair vibhūṣayantīva himāgamaṃ striyaḥ //
GK19kalrs_pu:228: vilāsinībhiḥ paripīḍitorasaḥ svapanti śītaṃ paribhūya kāminaḥ // KalRs_5.9
GK19kalrs_pu:230: niśāsu hṛṣṭā saha kāmibhiḥ striyaḥ pibanti madyaṃ madanīyamuttamam //
GK19kalrs_pu:232: priyatamaparibhuktaṃ vīkṣamāṇā svadehaṃ vrajati śayanavāsādvāsamanyaṃ hasantī // KalRs_5.11
GK19kalrs_pu:234: tyajati gurunitambā nimnanābhiḥ sumadhyā uṣasi śayanamanyā kāminī cāruśobhām // KalRs_5.12
GK19kalrs_pu:236: uṣasi vadanabimbairaṃsasaṃsaktakeśaiḥ śriya iva gṛhamadhye saṃsthitā yoṣito 'dya // KalRs_5.13
GK19kalrs_pu:238: suratasamayaveṣaṃ naiśamāśu prahāya dadhati divasayogyaṃ veśamanyāstaruṇyaḥ // KalRs_5.14
GK19kalrs_pu:239: nakhapadacitabhāgān vīkṣamāṇāḥ stanāntān adharakisalayāgraṃ dantabhinnaṃ spṛśantyaḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:242: priyajanarahitānāṃ citasaṃtāpahetuḥ śiśirasamaya eṣa śreyase vo 'stu
GK19kalrs_pu:246: manāṃsi bhettuṃ surataprasaṅgināṃ vasantayoddhā samupāgataḥ priye //
GK19kalrs_pu:247: drumāḥ sapuṣpāḥ salilaṃ sapadmaṃ striyaḥ sakāmāḥ pavanaḥ sugandhiḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:248: sukhāḥ pradoṣā divasāśca ramyāḥ sarvaṃ priye cārutaraṃ vasante //
GK19kalrs_pu:250: kurvanti nāryo 'pi vasantakāle stanaṃ sahāraṃ kusumairmanoharaiḥ //
GK19kalrs_pu:252: cūtadrumāṇāṃ kusumānvitānāṃ dadāti saubhāgyamayaṃ vasantaḥ // KalRs_6.4 //
GK19kalrs_pu:256: puṣpaṃ ca phullaṃ navamallikāyāḥ prayānti kāntiṃ pramadājanānām //
GK19kalrs_pu:257: staneṣu hārāḥ sitacandanārdrā bhujeṣu saṅgaṃ valayāṅgadāni /
GK19kalrs_pu:262: samīpavartiṣvadhunā priyeṣu samutsukā eva bhavanti nāryaḥ // KalRs_6.9 //
GK19kalrs_pu:265: chāyāṃ janaḥ samabhivāñchati pādapānāṃ naktaṃ tathecchati punaḥ kiraṇaṃ sudhāṃśoḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:266: harmyaṃ prayāti śayituṃ sukhaśītalaṃ ca kāntāṃ ca gāḍhamupagūhati śītalatvāt // KalRs_6.11
GK19kalrs_pu:267: netreṣu lolo madirālaseṣu gaṇḍeṣu pāṇḍuḥ kaṭhinaḥ staneṣu /
GK19kalrs_pu:268: madhyeṣu nimno jaghaneṣu pīnaḥ strīṇāmanaṅgo bahudhā sthito 'dya //
GK19kalrs_pu:270: bhrūkṣepajihmāni ca vīkṣitāni cakāra kāmaḥ pramadājanānām // KalRs_6.13 //
GK19kalrs_pu:272: ālipyate candanam aṅganābhir madālasābhir mṛganābhiyuktam // KalRs_6.14 //
GK19kalrs_pu:273: gurūṇi vāsāṃsi vihāya tūrṇaṃ tanūni lākṣārasarañjitāni /
GK19kalrs_pu:275: puṃskokilaś cūtarasāsavena mattaḥ priyāṃ cumbati rāgahṛṣṭaḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:276: kūjaddvirephāpyayam ambujasthaḥ priyaṃ priyāyāḥ prakaroti cāṭu //
GK19kalrs_pu:278: kurvanti kāmaṃ pavanāvadhūtāḥ paryutsukaṃ mānasamaṅganānām // KalRs_6.17
GK19kalrs_pu:280: kurvantyaśokā hṛdayaṃ saśokaṃ nirīkṣyamāṇā navayauvanānām // KalRs_6.18 //
GK19kalrs_pu:284: dṛṣṭvā priye sahṛdayasya bhavenna kasya kandarpabāṇapatanavyathitaṃ hi cetaḥ // KalRs_6.20
GK19kalrs_pu:286: sadyo vasantasamayena samāciteyaṃ raktāṃśukā navavadhūriva bhāti bhūmiḥ //
GK19kalrs_pu:287: kiṃ kiṃśukaiḥ śukamukhacchavibhirna bhinnaṃ kiṃ karṇikārakusumairna kṛtaṃ nu dagdham /
GK19kalrs_pu:288: yatkokilaḥ punarayaṃ madhurairvacobhir yūnāṃ manaḥ suvadanānihitaṃ nihanti
GK19kalrs_pu:290: lajjānvitaṃ savinayaṃ hṛdayaṃ kṣaṇena paryākulaṃ kulagṛhe 'pi kṛtaṃ vadhūnām // KalRs_6.23
GK19kalrs_pu:292: vāyur vivāti hṛdayāni harannarāṇāṃ nīhārapātavigamātsubhago vasante //
GK19kalrs_pu:294: cittaṃ munerapi haranti nivṛttarāgaṃ prāgeva rāgamalināni manāṃsi yūnām //
GK19kalrs_pu:296: māse madhau madhurakokilabhṛṅganādair nāryā haranti hṛdayaṃ prasabhaṃ narāṇām // KalRs_6.26
GK19kalrs_pu:298: śaileyajālapariṇaddhaśilātalāntān dṛṣṭvā janaḥ kṣitibhṛto mudameti sarvaḥ
GK19kalrs_pu:299: netre nimīlayati roditi yāti śokaṃ ghrāṇaṃ kareṇa viruṇaddhi virauti coccaiḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:301: samadamadhukarāṇāṃ kokilānāṃ ca nādaiḥ kusumitasahakāraiḥ karṇikāraiś ca ramyaḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:302: iṣubhiriva sutīkṣṇairmānasaṃ māninīnāṃ tudati kusumamāso manmathoddīpanāya
GK19kalrs_pu:307: karakisalayakāntiṃ pallavairvidrumābhair upahasati vasantaḥ kāminīnāmidānīm // KalRs_6.31
GK19kalrs_pu:309: madajanitavilāsair dṛṣṭipātair munīndrān stanabharanatanāryaḥ kāmayanti praśāntān // KalRs_6.32
GK19kalrs_pu:310: madhusurabhi mukhābjaṃ locane lodhratāmre navakurabakapūrṇaḥ keśapāśo manojñaḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:311: gurutarakucayugmaṃ śroṇibimbaṃ tathaiva na bhavati kimidānīṃ yoṣitāṃ manmathāya // KalRs_6.33
GK19kalrs_pu:313: utkūjitaiḥ parabhṛtasya madākulasya śrotrapriyairmadhukarasya ca gītanādaiḥ // KalRs_6.34
GK19kalrs_pu:314: ramyaḥ pradoṣasamayaḥ sphuṭacandrabhāsaḥ puṃskokilasya virutaṃ pavanaḥ sugandhiḥ /
GK19kalrs_pu:315: mattāliyūthavirutaṃ niśi sīdhupānaṃ sarvaṃ rasāyanamidaṃ kusumāyudhasya //
GK19kalrs_pu:317: cūtāmodasugandhimandapavanaḥ śṛṅgāradīkṣāguruḥ kalpāntaṃ madanapriyo diśatu vaḥ puṣpāgamo maṅgalam // KalRs_6.36 //
GK19kalrs_pu:319: vividhamadhupayūthair veṣṭyamānaḥ samantād bhavatu tava vasantaḥ śreṣṭhakālaḥ sukhāya // KalRs_6.37
GK19kalrs_pu:320: āmrī mañjulamañjarī varaśaraḥ satkiṃśukaṃ yaddhanur jyā yasyālikulaṃ kalaṅkarahitaṃ chattraṃ sitāṃśuḥ sitam /
GK19kalrs_pu:321: mattebho malayānilaḥ parabhṛtā yadbandino lokajit so 'yaṃ vo vitarītarītu vitanurbhadraṃ vasantānvitaḥ // KalRs_6.38 //
